mapper.select: select * from bus_road order by road_no
select bus_no from bus_road where road_no=#{no}
mapper.update: update bus_road set bus_no=#{bus_no},member_no=#{member_no},arrival=#{arrival}, departure=#{departure}, price=#{price}, arr_time=#{arr_time}, tot_time=#{tot_time} where road_no=#{road_no}
mapper.select: select A.bus_no,grade from bus A left outer join bus_road B on A.bus_no=B.bus_no where B.bus_no is null
select * from member inner join bus_road on member.member_no=bus_road.member_no
